title: PA-19-08: Annual Update of Post-Employment Component Designations (18 U.S.C. § 207(c)) due to OGE by July 1, 2019
url: https://www.oge.gov/Web/oge.nsf/Legal Docs/DD16434A9798D9CF852585BA005BEC1B/$FILE/PA-19-08 Annual Update of Post-Employment Component Designations.pdf?open
summary: This Program Advisory asks each agency to forward to OGE its annual letter stating whether its components that are currently designated should remain designated for purposes of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c). Any request to modify the existing list of components should be submitted in accordance with regulatory procedures.
